maplibre

Source: vignettes/maplibre.Rmd
maplibre.Rmd

Enable "maplibre" mode 

tmap_mode("maplibre")
#> ℹ tmap mode set to "maplibre".

Example 

tm_shape(World) + 
  tm_polygons("well_being",
    fill.scale = tm_scale_continuous(values = "pu_gn"))

Basemaps

Mapbox offers several basemap providers, namely:

tmap_providers()
#> [1] "voyager"     "positron"    "dark-matter"
tm_shape(metro) + 
  tm_dots(size = "pop2020", fill = "red")+
tm_basemap("positron")
#> [maplibre mode] map layer `tm_dots` not available for mode "maplibre". This map
#> layer is only available for modes "plot" and "view"
